channel.title: Cres' Barrows Log
channel.description:
Since I like Barrows so much and I seem to get a shitton of loot from them , I've decided to make a log of all the items i get :D
[code] 1st week , forgot the actual days of getting the rewards... * ahrim's top * ahrim's skirt x2 * verac's helm * verac's flail * guthan's helm * ahrim's staff
11 / 7 / 2011 * dharok's body * guthan's body * tooth half of key * guthan's spear * dharok's legs
12 / 7 / 2011 * 2 trips but no rewards <.< * i did get my fire cape though! :D [/code]
[b]My stats[/b] Attack : 78 Strength : 82 Defence : 78 Hitpoints : 84 Prayer : 51 Magic : 80 Ranged : 84 Summoning : 60
Combat : 106
[b]Bank value = 15m[/b] Should I post pictures aswell?
[img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/lolololol.jpg[/img] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/vhelm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/drop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/dhleg.jpg[/img]

item.title: Cres' Barrows Log
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Chassy13:

Me and my friend used to get a ton of items as well. I think the rate of rewards has been changed to be easier, because back in the day if you got a piece you shitbrix.

That still happens to me btw ; whenever i open the chest i freeze for 2 seconds , looking around in my inventory if i got anything
After that i get a certain time of air , depending on the value of the item xD

Read full topic

item.title: Cres' Barrows Log
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Chassy13:

Me and my friend used to get a ton of items as well. I think the rate of rewards has been changed to be easier, because back in the day if you got a piece you shitbrix.

I remember spending over 15m in supplies… getting nothing but runes and one ahrim staff back… over 100 trips… gone…

either im really unfucking lucky, or… nvm probably that.
OT:
Nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Cres' Barrows Log
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:13, topic:403565”]You still shit brix when you get a dragon pickaxe almost immediately after finishing the quest to go the the CDB though.[/quote]I was there for hours and got squat…

item.title: Cres' Barrows Log
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Theres also the ring of wealth now and that helps a lot. I almost shat brix when I got my Karil’s top my first run using it

You still shit brix when you get a dragon pickaxe almost immediately after finishing the quest to go the the CDB though.

Read full topic

item.title: Cres' Barrows Log
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

DevilsCape:

XD another reward?, that’s good for you :), Hope you get even better rewards :), but answer me you always get good rewards like that?, never tried barrows tho, i guess i should try it

I get 1 reward every 4 chests , and i do 4 - 6 chests every trip.
I think that ratio has somthing to do with the frequency of the rewards.
In the beginning when i did 1 chest every trip i rarely got a reward ( ratio of 1 reward for 20 chests )

kickingjamie:

all those loots in one day? you lucky biatch.

IKR

I think i’m gonna call it a day…
Moar trips tomorrow xD

Read full topic

item.title: Cres' Barrows Log
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

rip4d:

You’re meleeing? Jeez, I thought you were maging 100% or something xD Well once I get membership again I think I may have to go do some barrows again I always loved it, mainly because it really didn’t get boring quickly at all.

Wind wave on the melee brothers.
bgs special on ahrim
bgs ( no special ) on karil

then use guthans spear on the skeletons and stuff in the crypts

And i agree ; barrows never gets boring , unlike the other events xD

Read full topic
